page.title: 07Life in a sub post-office.
page.content: My name is Claire Hewitt and my parents own a local sub post-office.Certain days are particularly busy.Thursday is one of those days.Thursday is pension day.Many people come to the post-office early so that they avoid queuing.As well as coming to collect their pensions and buy stamps and postal orders, people buy things from the hardware section. Friday is another busy day,because it is accounts day.We have to add up all the money,check the stamps and make sure that everything is all right. Saturday is not so busy.Most people come into the shop to buy something from the hardware section. On Sunday the shop is closed.
